seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

pricing_models.type: Flat fee plus user license fees
pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
pricing_models.duration: Annual billing, term length varies based on contract

pricing_models.description: Whatfix offers a free plan with 30 credits.
Whatfix offers a basic plan at $39 per month.

buyer_research.name: BMC Software Inc.
buyer_research.description: BMC Software, Inc. is an American multinational information technology (IT) services and consulting, and enterprise software company based in Houston, Texas.
goals: Optimize technology and accelerate digital transformation
Drive business growth, innovation, and sustainable success

competitors.name: WalkMe
pros: Boost digital adoption at scale with confidence

competitors.name: Pendo
differentiators: Product experience and digital adoption solutions

pros: Easy to use and set up

pros: Easy to use and set up

pros: Easy to use and set up

pains: How can Whatfix help optimize technology and accelerate digital transformation at BMC Software Inc.?
How does Whatfix address complex IT problems in IT Service Management (ITSM)?
Can Whatfix support BMC Software Inc.'s user adoption goals for software deployment and endpoint management?
Will Whatfix's digital adoption platform be scalable for an enterprise of our size?
How can Whatfix help BMC Software Inc. maximize ROI on technology investments?
Can Whatfix integrate with our existing ITSM tools and systems?
What are the implementation timelines and resource requirements for Whatfix?
How will Whatfix support our change request management process?
Can Whatfix provide analytics and insights to measure the success of our digital transformation initiatives?
objections: Whatfix seems expensive for our budget. Can you provide a more cost-effective solution?
We're already using a digital adoption platform. How does Whatfix compare to our current solution?
We have unique ITSM requirements. Can Whatfix customize its platform to meet our needs?
Whatfix's implementation process seems complex. Can you simplify it for us?
We're concerned about the learning curve for our IT staff to adopt Whatfix. Can you provide additional support?
How does Whatfix's pricing model compare to its competitors?
We need a more flexible pricing plan. Can Whatfix offer a custom pricing model?
How does Whatfix ensure data security and compliance with enterprise IT standards?

messages.content: Hi, this is [Sales Person's Name] from Whatfix. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. Can you please start by telling me a little bit about your role at BMC Software Inc. and what brings you to this call today?

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: Hi, thanks for having me. I'm Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc. We're always looking for ways to optimize our technology investments and accelerate digital transformation. I'm interested in learning more about Whatfix and how it can help us achieve our goals.

Great to hear that, Ayman. Can you tell me more about your current digital transformation initiatives and what specific pain points you're experiencing in terms of user adoption and technology investments?

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: Well, we have a large IT team and a complex IT infrastructure. We've been struggling to get our users to adopt new software and tools, which is hindering our digital transformation efforts. We're also experiencing challenges with change request management and ensuring compliance with our IT standards.

I understand. It sounds like you're experiencing some common pain points that our digital adoption platform can help address. Can you tell me more about your current IT Service Management (ITSM) process and how you're currently supporting your users?

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: We're using a combination of tools and manual processes to manage our ITSM. However, it's not very efficient and we're finding it difficult to scale. We're looking for a solution that can help us automate and streamline our ITSM process.

I see. Whatfix can help you automate and streamline your ITSM process with our digital adoption platform. We've worked with similar enterprises to help them optimize their technology investments and accelerate digital transformation. Can I walk you through a demo of our platform and show you how it can help address your specific pain points?

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: Yes, that would be great. I'd love to see a demo and understand more about how Whatfix can help us achieve our goals.

Great! I'll walk you through a demo of our platform. (Demo) As you can see, our platform provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. We can help you create customized guides and tutorials to support your users and ensure they're getting the most out of your technology investments.

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: That looks very impressive. I can see how this could help us improve our user adoption rates and reduce the burden on our IT team. Can you tell me more about the implementation process and what kind of support you provide?

Absolutely. Our implementation process is typically 4-6 weeks, and we provide dedicated support to ensure a smooth rollout. We also offer ongoing support and training to ensure you're getting the most out of our platform.

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: That sounds great. What about pricing and ROI? How can I justify the investment in Whatfix to our stakeholders?

We have a flexible pricing model that's based on the number of users and applications you're supporting. We've seen our customers achieve an ROI of 3-5 times their investment in Whatfix. I can provide you with some case studies and ROI calculations to help you justify the investment.

messages.user: Ayman Sayed, CEO at BMC Software Inc.
messages.content: That would be great, thank you. I think that covers everything for now. What are the next steps and how can we move forward with Whatfix?

I'm glad we could have this conversation, Ayman. The next steps would be to schedule a follow-up call to discuss the ROI calculations and answer any additional questions you may have. I'll also send over some case studies and information about our implementation process. After that, we can discuss a potential pilot or proof of concept to test our platform within your organization.

pain_points: Struggling to get users to adopt new software and tools
objections: How to justify the investment in Whatfix to stakeholders
success_indicators: Reduce the burden on the IT team
budget_constraints: Need to justify the investment to stakeholders

discovery_questions: Can you please start by telling me a little bit about your role at BMC Software Inc. and what brings you to this call today?
Can you tell me more about your current digital transformation initiatives and what specific pain points you're experiencing in terms of user adoption and technology investments?
Can you tell me more about your current IT Service Management (ITSM) process and how you're currently supporting your users?

objection_resolution_pairs.objection: How to justify the investment in Whatfix to stakeholders
objection_resolution_pairs.resolution: We've seen our customers achieve an ROI of 3-5 times their investment in Whatfix. I can provide you with some case studies and ROI calculations to help you justify the investment.

insights: BMC Software Inc. is struggling to get users to adopt new software and tools, which is hindering their digital transformation efforts.
They're experiencing challenges with change request management and ensuring compliance with IT standards.
The IT team is finding it difficult to scale their current ITSM process, which is a combination of tools and manual processes.
Whatfix's digital adoption platform can help BMC Software Inc. accelerate digital transformation, improve user adoption rates, and reduce the burden on the IT team.
improvements: The salesperson could have asked more questions about the decision-making process to understand the buyer's needs better.
The salesperson could have provided more specific examples of how Whatfix has helped similar enterprises achieve their goals.
The salesperson could have offered a pilot or proof of concept to test Whatfix's platform within BMC Software Inc.'s organization.
